name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Unity Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications and mobile performance optimization. Proficient in **Unity**, **C#**, and multithreaded programming, with a strong focus on enhancing mobile performance through advanced **GPU profiling** and **CPU profiling** techniques. Skilled in implementing asset streaming and leveraging the **Burst Compiler** for optimal performance, along with a comprehensive understanding of the **Job System** and various **profiling tools**.

Demonstrated expertise in applying best practices in memory management and using diagnostics frameworks for troubleshooting and performance tuning. Excellent communication and mentoring skills enable effective collaboration and guidance within development teams. Background in building scalable AI/ML-powered platforms makes me adaptable to evolving tech landscapes.
